createOrJoin:
What would you like to do today?
Create a new meeting or join existing one.
enterUserNameClause: This name will be visible to meeting participants
enterMeetingNameTextForJoin: Enter the title of the active meeting you want to join
enterValidMeetingTitleMessage: Meeting titles cannot contain special characters ( % # @ ! > $ % < > ^ & * _ - + = { } [ ] ; : , . ‘ “ ~ / )
firstToArriveSubtitle: Wait or invite other participants to join.
welcomeDescription:
To use the Video Call app, a Dolby.io 
account and access token are required.
disclaimer:

startRecordingHint: After the recording is complete, you can access it from the dolby.io dashboard.
stopRecordingHint: After the recording is complete, you can access it from the dolby.io dashboard.
messageRecordingSuccessful: Your recording has been saved. You can download it from the dolby.io dashboard.
provideTokenDescription: In order to use this app you need to provide a token from the
tokenInfoStep1Value: Navigate to the Dolby.io dashboard Demo page.
tokenInfoStep2Value: Retrieve your token by selecting the QR Code button then scan the code. You can also copy the Client access token directly, then paste it into the paste tab below.
